sampleservice.description: REST END POINT For Sample Service with no security restrictions

sampleserviceappkey.description: REST END POINT For Sample Service that uses appkey that can be specified at the time of deployment or will be autogenerated

sampleservicebasic.description: REST END POINT For Sample Service with user specfic keys generated by keymgr service and uses http basic acess authentication protocol

sampleserviceacckey.description: REST END POINT For Sample Service with user specific keys using custom HMAC based authentication

taskserver.description: REST Endpoint for workflow service. Not secure and is only for testing purposes
